<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This file defines nodes for use within a SuffixTree.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Each node has either no children or at least two children, with the root</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// being a exception in the empty tree.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Children are represented as a map between unsigned integers and nodes. If</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a node N has a child M on unsigned integer k, then the mapping represented</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// by N is a proper prefix of the mapping represented by M. Note that this,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// although similar to a trie is somewhat different: each node stores a full</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// substring of the full mapping rather than a single character state.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Each internal node contains a pointer to the internal node representing</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the same string, but with the first character chopped off. This is stored</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// in \\p Link. Each leaf node stores the start index of its respective</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// suffix in \\p SuffixIdx.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">private</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/nodekind">NodeKind</a> Kind;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The start index of this node&#39;s substring in the main string.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> StartIdx = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#a9038deca521822084ac798637368c94e">EmptyIdx</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The length of the string formed by concatenating the edge labels from</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the root to this node.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ConcatLen = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// These two indices give a range of indices for its leaf descendants.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Imagine drawing a tree on paper and assigning a unique index to each leaf</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// node in monotonically increasing order from left to right. This way of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// numbering the leaf nodes allows us to associate a continuous range of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// indices with each internal node. For example, if a node has leaf</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// descendants with indices i, i+1, ..., j, then its LeftLeafIdx is i and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// its RightLeafIdx is j. These indices are for LeafNodes in the SuffixTree</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// class, which is constructed using post-order depth-first traversal.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LeftLeafIdx = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#a9038deca521822084ac798637368c94e">EmptyIdx</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RightLeafIdx = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#a9038deca521822084ac798637368c94e">EmptyIdx</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// LLVM RTTI boilerplate.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#a29aabba4cb1896a6fe8105e057f01d91"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#add485021cba74f84f545a03c2deb6db3">NodeKind</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#a29aabba4cb1896a6fe8105e057f01d91">getKind</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Kind; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#a81101451dd797327456c73527a6e440b"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#a81101451dd797327456c73527a6e440b">SuffixTreeNode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#add485021cba74f84f545a03c2deb6db3">NodeKind</a> Kind, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> StartIdx)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal">      : Kind(Kind), StartIdx(StartIdx) &#123;&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#a67c39a86a8a3f647d11979a1673a5df5"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">virtual</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#a67c39a86a8a3f647d11979a1673a5df5">~SuffixTreeNode</a>() = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">default</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A node with two or more children, or the root.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreeinternalnode"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreeinternalnode/#aee4f3eefe02d5d475ffb06b54b7da9ed">SuffixTreeInternalNode</a> : <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#a81101451dd797327456c73527a6e440b">SuffixTreeNode</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">private</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The end index of this node&#39;s substring in the main string.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Every leaf node must have its \\p EndIdx incremented at the end of every</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// step in the construction algorithm. To avoid having to update O(N)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// nodes individually at the end of every step, the end index is stored</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// as a pointer.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EndIdx = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#a9038deca521822084ac798637368c94e">EmptyIdx</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// A pointer to the internal node representing the same sequence with the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// first character chopped off.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This acts as a shortcut in Ukkonen&#39;s algorithm. One of the things that</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Ukkonen&#39;s algorithm does to achieve linear-time construction is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// keep track of which node the next insert should be at. This makes each</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// insert O(1), and there are a total of O(N) inserts. The suffix link</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// helps with inserting children of internal nodes.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Say we add a child to an internal node with associated mapping S. The</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// next insertion must be at the node representing S - its first character.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This is given by the way that we iteratively build the tree in Ukkonen&#39;s</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// algorithm. The main idea is to look at the suffixes of each prefix in the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// string, starting with the longest suffix of the prefix, and ending with</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the shortest. Therefore, if we keep pointers between such nodes, we can</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// move to the next insertion point in O(1) time. If we don&#39;t, then we&#39;d</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// have to query from the root, which takes O(N) time. This would make the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// construction algorithm O(N^2) rather than O(N).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreeinternalnode/#aee4f3eefe02d5d475ffb06b54b7da9ed">SuffixTreeInternalNode</a> &#42;Link = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// LLVM RTTI boilerplate.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreeinternalnode/#a945ed42e87aca83910a3f79960d00eb7"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreeinternalnode/#a945ed42e87aca83910a3f79960d00eb7">classof</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#a81101451dd797327456c73527a6e440b">SuffixTreeNode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;getKind() == <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#add485021cba74f84f545a03c2deb6db3a1c5cd656d7af113d4cb72dc8046dc1ad">NodeKind::ST&#95;Internal</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\returns true if this node is the root of its owning \\p SuffixTree.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreeinternalnode/#a05b664c3b910cb6d5cda2ba6b83b759c">isRoot</a>() </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\returns the end index of this node&#39;s substring in the entire string.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreeinternalnode/#ac38ddb7b7fb273fb64379c661efaf974">getEndIdx</a>() </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const override</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Sets \\p Link to \\p L. Assumes \\p L is not null.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreeinternalnode/#ae53280c72c15c2777d813369d19d4868">setLink</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreeinternalnode">SuffixTreeInternalNode</a> &#42;L);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\returns the pointer to the Link node.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreeinternalnode">SuffixTreeInternalNode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreeinternalnode/#aa3ef8294e550ab22ebf4335773828603">getLink</a>() </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The children of this node.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// A child existing on an unsigned integer implies that from the mapping</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// represented by the current node, there is a way to reach another</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// mapping by tacking that character on the end of the current string.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreeinternalnode/#a244b1a8b6c26960faf2663376005ca7a"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;unsigned, SuffixTreeNode &#42;&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreeinternalnode/#a244b1a8b6c26960faf2663376005ca7a">Children</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreeinternalnode/#aee4f3eefe02d5d475ffb06b54b7da9ed"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreeinternalnode/#aee4f3eefe02d5d475ffb06b54b7da9ed">SuffixTreeInternalNode</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> StartIdx, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EndIdx,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A node representing a suffix.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreeleafnode"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreeleafnode/#af5c90c6f297ac5c895a657cc9f09a948">SuffixTreeLeafNode</a> : <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#a81101451dd797327456c73527a6e440b">SuffixTreeNode</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The start index of the suffix represented by this leaf.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SuffixIdx = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/suffixtreenode/#a9038deca521822084ac798637368c94e">EmptyIdx</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The end index of this node&#39;s substring in the main string.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Every leaf node must have its \\p EndIdx incremented at the end of every</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// step in the construction algorithm. To avoid having to update O(N)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// nodes individually at the end of every step, the end index is stored</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// as a pointer.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;EndIdx = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
